attributes.action: MP's Expenses that was wrongly claimed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If feel that if MP'S claim for items that never excited that should get charged with the offence that they have comitted.For example;  if we claimed £13,000 for a mortage that neaver excited we the members of the public would get charged with FRAUD and a mark put agaisnt our names.  This should happen wo all the MP'S that have wrongly claimed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
